titleStmt.title: Select thoughts, or, Choice helps for a pious spirit a century of divine breathings for a ravished soule, beholding the excellencies of her Lord Jesus / by J. Hall ...
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656. Breathings of a devout soul.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Published in 1648 with title: Select thoughts, one century.
The second part has separate paging and caption title: The breathings of the devout soul.
